articles.title: Women more likely to have lasting taste issues after covid-19 than men
articles.description: About 11 to 15 per cent of women seem to have issues with smell and taste at least six months after developing covid-19 if they had initial problems with the senses, but just 1 to 3 per cent of men

articles.title: Flexible robot hand with precise grip lifts 1000 times its own weight

articles.title: Physicists calculate highest dives most humans can safely withstand
